def_en: You use -baiting after nouns to refer to the activity of attacking a particular group of people or laughing at their beliefs.

def_cn: 表示“纵狗斗（獾、熊或牛等）”
def_en: Badger-baiting, bear-baiting, and bull-baiting involve making these animals fight dogs, while making sure that the animals are unable to defend themselves properly.
